s.text: We have been told on reasonably high authority that true charity vaunteth not itself; it is not puffed up.
When it comes to handling the rest of your life, we give you exactly the same advice.
Two hours on the golf course makes a serious dent in the problem of getting some exercise; maybe it's time to see what else in life is worthy of attention.
Two hours on the golf course makes a serious dent in the problem of getting some exercise; maybe it's time to see what else in life is worthy of attention.
Two hours on the golf course makes a serious dent in the problem of getting some exercise; maybe it's time to see what else in life is worthy of attention.
But if you care about your own sense of satisfaction, you'll enjoy pointing to 10 different charities and saying, "I gave to all those!"
But such delusions of grandeur can't be very common.
